title: Enhancing e-Learning Competencies: Interplay of Trust and Learning in Industrial Clusters—A Conceptual Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: They can define and explain industrial cluster components and inter-organizational trust-building mechanisms as mathematical variables.
Based on literature review results, they can derive three or more conceptual models supporting cluster learning theory.
They can represent causal relationships between trust-distance-information flow using network analysis techniques (e.g., graph theory).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
